programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: Anna Faris vs. Chris Pratt
programme.desc: S1:E6 If Chris Pratt didn’t have an affair with Jennifer Lawrence, why did he file for divorce From Anna Faris? Chris Pratt and Anna Faris were the famous, ideal couple the world couldn’t get enough of. But when Chris Pratt skyrocketed into superstardom, Anna felt more and more insecure. Then, rumors of Chris having an affair with co-star Jennifer Lawrence emerged. Even though they both deny having an affair, Chris and Annas sudden divorce, fallout of their personal lives, and the health of their son caused a media frenzy that our team got to the bottom of.

programme.title: Amber Rose vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E5 it true that Kanye West was harassing Amber Rose when she suddenly left him? When Kanye West started dating Amber Rose, he took her from the life of being a stripper to the global superstar world. At first, they seemed like a couple that was truly in love. But when Amber suddenly left Kanye, his attitude towards her completely changed. Our team uncovered the real story behind the tabloids of the years of bullying, unwanted media attention, and attacks that Amber had to suffer. The true story will reveal why she was the special woman Kanye fell in love with in the first place, and what she and Kim Kardashian have in common.

programme.title: Steps to Financial Success: Grow Your Wealth at Any Age
programme.desc: Do you know what the most important steps are that you can take today to grow your wealth? Regardless of your age or where you are in life with saving for retirement, todays show is for you. Joe Anderson, CFP, and Big Al Clopine, CPA give you the steps to success to grow your wealth at any age!

programme.title: WTF Does Private Equity Actually Do
programme.desc: Private equity is nothing more than any investment company that invests into assets that are not listed on public markets. The variety of private equity companies is enormous.

programme.title: "Business ""Ethics"""
programme.desc: "It’s understandable that investors would like their money going towards companies that are (at the very least) TRYING to do the right thing, but unfortunately not many people really understand how these investments work, or how they could actually be making these problems a lot worse. So it’s time to learn How Money Works to find out why corporate ethics, is the second worst idea in business history."

programme.title: "IRA Timing, Long-Term Care, & Financial Survival"
programme.desc: "Ric uses the story of Goldilocks to illustrate the challenges of knowing when to take money from an IRA: not too soon, not too late and not too much but ""just right""; answers questions about long-term care insurance; interviews author Carol Joynt (Innocent Spouse) about the financial nightmare she faced after her husband died - a $3 million tax bill!"

programme.title: "Expensive Retirements, Life Insurance, and Kathy Ireland"
programme.desc: Sailing off into the sunset could mean a very expensive retirement...Ric Edelman explains why; Who really needs life insurance? And an interview with Kathy Ireland - how she went from being a super model to a super mogul.

programme.title: Your Money Your Wealth: Financial Facts vs. Fiction: Medicare Check-Up: Keep Your Retirement Plan Off Life Support
programme.desc: Are health care costs threatening to put your financial plan for retirement on life support? If you overlook this important aspect of retirement planning, it could throw off your entire financial bottom line. Every day about 10,000 Americans turn age 65, at which point they qualify for Medicare. But for many retirees, Medicare enrollment is complicated and confusing at best. Not to mention the pressure of making decisions about Medicare coverage. Choosing the right Medicare plan for you could save hundreds of dollars. Watch as the ""Dynamic Duo"" of financial planning, Joe Anderson, CFP, and Alan Clopine, CPA give you a Medicare check-up!

programme.title: Avoid Retirement Lotto: Investing in Volatile Markets
programme.desc: From the rise and fall of the individual stocks to get-rich-quick tales of crypto currencies many people are looking for a short-term solution to a long-term planning problem and playing retirement lotto. Financial professionals Joe Anderson and Alan Clopine discuss ways to avoid retirement lottery and they guide you through strategies for investing in volatile markets.

programme.title: What Investment Bankers Actually do
programme.desc: The growth in popularity of zero commission brokerages has allowed many first time investors to enter the market without having to pay costly brokerage fees that would have made their investments pointless in the first place. Before platforms like robin hood the industry standard for stockbrokers was to charge a fixed percentage of every trade made on both the buy and the sell side normally 1-2 for orders over $5,000.

programme.title: PRISMA
programme.desc: Prisma es un programa cultural producido por CGTN en español en colaboración con el multimedio de comunicación latinoamericano teleSUR. Su objetivo es mostrar a los televidentes la riqueza cultural de China y el mundo hispanohablante, elevar el conocimiento de la cultura china en los países de habla hispana y establecer una plataforma de diálogo entre ambas partes. Se trata de un programa mensual de 30 minutos de duración que comenzó a emitirse en agosto de 2016. Está compuesto de tres segmentos que destacan por su diversidad temática. Primero, un espacio de noticias culturales; después, una semblanza de alguna personalidad del ámbito cultural latinoamericano; y finalmente un documental sobre aspectos de la cultura china.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Parts Unlimited Talent Cup by Motul
programme.desc: Catch all the can't-miss moments from Race 1 of the Parts Unlimited Talent Cup by Motul at Barber.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Parts Unlimited Talent Cup by Motul
programme.desc: The rising stars return to the track for Race 2 in Alabama!

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship
programme.desc: High‑octane gearbox action from Sarno’s 1.67 km Italian circuit. Top KZ drivers clash, thrilling battles unfold under May’s Mediterranean sun.

programme.title: Quilt Basics
programme.desc: Get started with the basics for traditional quilting. What could be more basic than quilting for home decor and apparel? Rebecca Kemp Brent has a demonstration on free motion and guided quilting to hold a kaleidoscope applique in place, plus a short discussion on fusibles and needles. Then, Angela Wolf demonstrates ruching with elastic thread.

programme.title: Classic Details
programme.desc: Today's show looks at a few classic details. Amy Alan has a serger lesson. She reviews the basic serger stitches and teaches when to use them and tension adjustments for each. Then, Angela Wolf introduces princess seams -- why you use them, how to adjust for fit, and then how to sew them. Finally, Kenneth D. King has a couture technique for curved tucks on a fabulous top.

programme.title: Quick and Easy
programme.desc: Time can be an element of jewelry design and this episode is all about speed – quick and easy projects that include prefinished components and unique materials. First, Leslie Rogalski shows how to stitch a suite of variations of finished jewelry using shaped beads and metal fashion components; mix and match for quick designing. Then, Julie Fei Fan Balzer, the host of Make It Artsy, stops by with cork earrings.

programme.title: Shape It
programme.desc: Today's theme is shape it. Use these techniques to form shapes that give structure and interest to your jewelry projects. Stitch wire and bead chandelier earrings, make gum drop- bead embroidered mandalas with Jennifer Van Benschoten, form a no fail soldered bangle bracelet with Kate Richbourg, and then, sculpt a beaded collar.

programme.title: Episode 6: Your Personal Touch
programme.desc: Add a personal touch to your scrapbooking to make it uniquely your own. First, Julie shows how to use your handwriting to add a personal touch. Next, Stacy Julian makes a pocket scrapbook with a flower theme. In an interview segment, Kathy Cano-Murillo shares her creative process. Then, Julie uses colorful fluorescent pens to embellish a page with journaling and doodling. Last, Julie shows how to use watercolors to create a card for a pocket scrapbook page.

programme.title: Inspiration
programme.desc: This season is all about inspiration, particularly from the art masters. We're not only inspired but we take that creativity one step further with new materials. We begin with a design that pays homage to Sigmar Polke, a contemporary artist that was known for using varied materials even glass. We make a stitched canvas. Then Joe Rotella is back, taking a page from Sigmar's book by using found objects like wood and license plates to make a modern birdhouse. We'll finish up with May Flaum and the post-impressionist era and a lesson on being inspired by art but styling it in your own way.

programme.title: The Knitting Circle Presented by CraftsyTV
programme.desc: Learn to knit with CraftsyTV.

programme.title: Modern Technology Half-Square Triangle Quilt
programme.desc: Angela's reminded of her age as she relies on her kids to keep up with the digital world. Watch as she uses two basic shapes to create a mod half-square triangle quilt that's easier to make than it looks.

programme.title: DIY Quilted Zipper Pouch
programme.desc: Welcome to the second episode of the Holiday Gift-Along! Your hostess with the mostest (thread), Angela Walters, is back with another gift-worthy project idea: a basic quilted zipper bag with boxed corners. Don't worry, making zippers isn't as scary as you think!

programme.title: Our Agent In Damascus
programme.desc: Uri's health is deteriorating. Nimrode reveals another detail regarding what happened with Amiel. Nurit heads out on a mission behind enemy lines. Yussuf must use his wit to avoid Abdullah, who's hot on his trail.

programme.title: Horror
programme.desc: From Psycho to Saw, audiences always love to be scared, but why does the Horror genre endure? Hosts Gregory Cohen and Sara Greenfield tackle that question, highlighting horror classics Night of the Living Dead, Jaws, Halloween and The Conjuring.

programme.title: Abraham Argues to Save Sodom
programme.desc: Visiting Nebi Yakin, where Abraham argued with G-d. In the floor of the ancient mosque, there are footsteps marking the location where Abraham stood. The site is a 2.5 hour walk from Hebron, the first place seen on the way to the Dead Sea Valley.

programme.title: King David

programme.desc: Indigenous beauty pagent contestants from South Pacific countries challenge developed nations to reduce carbon emissions before their island homes are submerged by rising seas. programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 9
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 9
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: LEMONAIDING THE ENEMY
programme.desc: Feeling sorry for Mark, the Ninjas throw him a bone. This almost backfires, however, when he unexpectedly returns accompanied by Durian and a gang of chumplings.

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: A Bumpy Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: Recess
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: COMMANDO KAPPA
programme.desc: Chai Raja cycles in with a fresh batch of bananas when heavy army boots crunch in stomping at the door of the hotel. Chai Raja looks up and is not one jot happy to see his bossy estranged uncle Commando Kappa. Commando Kappa is a bossy man who wants to take over the hotel from Chai Raja and is zany enough to try any underhanded trick . Sundar senses this animosity and wants Kappa out of the shop but 6 and a half foot , Arnold like built Commando Kappa is a tough man to cross. Because he is no great cook, Kappa uses his army tactics to sabotage and tries messing up Chai Rajas ingredients- he switches the ingredients for the tea, Chai Raja knives suddenly go missing etc- Chai Raja however is quick at adapting and when knives go missing he merely uses his moustache to chop the bananas! Sunder too does his best to foil Kappa. and save Chai Raja- like when Kappa accidentally spills oil intending to slip up Chai Raja, Sundar rather himself skid in and break his own bones just so Chai Raja doesnt step into the oil or guzzle up all the chilli-spiced tea (thanks to Kappa dropping chilli powder into the brew on the sly) before Chai Raja serves it to customers and loses his reputation. However the curious Basha keeps poking his naughty nose in and its difficult for Sundar to keep up with Kappas ploys. Kappa tries to finally seize up the flexible Chai Raja, by offering a tampered herbal oil to limber him up (the oil actually stiffens whatever it is poured on- can demonstrate the effect when Kappa does a test on a small sapling on the sill). But just then Sundar and Basha tumble in as part of their chase and the oil flies landing on Kappa gets all seized up and stiff. The cricked Kappa gives up and is shown the door and Basha gives him a 21- banana peel sendoff. But Sundar has no time to rejoice for Basha is again sneaking up to the fries and must be stopped.

programme.title: Never Give Up - Odessa
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: MAKEOVER
programme.desc: On the anniversary, Chai Raja wants the interior to be swankier and hires a painter to do his forefathers portrait (looks a lot like him)- only the painter is a free-loader who paints less and swipes snacks more- and he is even shiftier than Basha. Sundar quickly notices the painters nicking habits, but cant convince Chai Raja of the same. Basha, on the other hand finds himself up against someone who is craftier than Sundar. Sundar and Basha in their own ways try to bring the thieving painter to book (while Sundar tries to amp up the portrait as well) and succeed in ousting the crook, though much cant be said of Chai Rajas portrait ... in the end it looks more like Sundars forefather than Chai Rajas.

programme.title: Prince Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy discovers that he may be next in line to the throne of a tiny faraway country – and he takes a crash-course in ‘how to be royal’... with ‘crash’ being the key word!

programme.title: Cryyyy-stal
programme.desc: Its valentine day and Dunky has got a small crystal cupid as a gift for his girlfriend. He has care fully kept it on the table…

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
programme.desc: The Hare, the fastest animal in the woods, and the tortoise, the slowest, compete in a race.

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: SPICED UP
programme.desc: It is a regular day at Hotel Kelifornia. But things change when a political convoy breaks down just in front of the hotel and the politician with his chelas come into the hotel. Chai Raja is super-excited to have VIP guest. To serve his the best of his tea, Chai Raja opens a special shelf and takes out a very specially protected rack. It is a small herbarium filled with the most exoctic tea saplings...sure to make Chai Rajas brews that much more irresistible. Sundar is assigned the responsibility of taking care of the saplings...but Basha has to stick his monkey-snout into the affairs so that Sundar would be too caught up trying to keep the exotic saplings safe from harm and would be distracted from the snack shelf which is Bashastarget.. Now Basha has two distractions to mess with and make Sundars life more miserable. Sundar stumbles, fumbles and lurches through service till his clashes with Basha ends in Sundar landing the herbarium on the VIP guest. Everything in the shop reaches the VIP guest, except for the tea. He is beaten, bruised and infuriated. And when he couldnt take it anymore and he is about to get out, poor Sundar somehow gets the tea to him. Raged beyond words, he sips the special tea.. It is heaven!!! He loves itttt. He thanks Chai Raja, and leaves the teashop a happy man (yet bruised and limping). Sundar is ecstatic. And Basha is flummoxed!

programme.title: Froggy Friends
programme.desc: The frogs from the well are good friends of Keet so when ever Cat tries to enter the house to steal something from the kitchen they will croak and Keet.

programme.title: Pineapple Rain
programme.desc: When Nardys pizza propagating machine goes awry, he tosses it out the window and into the hands of Biggs who turns it into an extreme weather making machine. Can Nardy and the other Smighties stop it in time?

programme.title: Pirates Ahoy!
programme.desc: Nardy is afraid to swim and Dude tries to teach him, but Nardy just doesnt seem to get it. It all comes together though when the Villains dressed as pirates steal the Water Stone. Nardy has to dive in and face his fears to save the day.

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: Non Stop Dance Party
programme.desc: Melody creates a tune so catchy that she puts all the Smighties into a trance. Its up to her to now save the day and stop the villains with her powerful music.

programme.title: KALAI-TEA-TEA
programme.desc: Chai Raja is organizing a Kathakali performance in front of his teashop for a group of special guests in the evening. The Kathakali dancer is in the shop enjoying tea and snacks. In the crazy fight between Sundar and Basha, the dancers both legs gets bandaged and he runs away from the shop. Chai Raja catches Sundar in the act! Chai Raja is so angry and panicking. He decides that Sundar is going to dance Kathakali! Next we see a poor Sundar all dressed up in the Kathakali costume with his snout sticking out. The performance starts and Sundar doesnt know what to do. The naughty Basha still has no plans to leave poor Sundaralone. He tries to trips, tickle, push and irritate Sundar from the rafter of the stage. Sundar is running all over the stage musch to Bashas delight and Chai Rajas horror. But the special guests love Sundars performance and awards him with a trophy! Basha is stunnedand Sundar is thrilled beyond words!

programme.title: The Controllator
programme.desc: Everyone has forgotten April’s birthday, so when a stranger gives her a present, she’s delighted to accept it. It’s one of Negu’s inventions, which makes her do things against her will. When April, controlled by Negu, manages to steal the Glove of the North, Pai and Xia prove that they had remembered her birthday really, and get April to remove the device that’s control her.

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: What CeCe Saw
programme.desc: Upon discovering the Creepy Candy TM fooling around in his secret laboratory again, Victor crams them into his lunchbox. Soon after, he bumps into CeCe OMalley, the new girl at school, and their lunchboxes accidently get switched. Once Victor realizes this He chases after CeCe to keep her from opening the lunchbox.Can Victor get to her in time before she opens the lunchbox? Can he stop her from discovering his secret about the Creepy Candy TM? Will Cece learn about the other creepy secrets the old library holds?

programme.title: The Star Talers
programme.desc: In the cold winter, the kindhearted girl, GoGo, meets several people who feel sorry for her on her way home. A fairy queen appears in front of a GoGGo that distributes all her clothes and bread and shakes in the cold.

programme.title: COWBUAAY CHAI
programme.desc: There is a harvest festival and Chai Raja expects extra business. Sundar is awed by the grand floats and dressed up cattle but what seems to be the star attraction is a cattle wrangler who dressed in fancy gear shows off his talent at lassoing. Sundar manages to cajole a lasso out of the performer but is pathetic he just ends up breaking stuff around the shop. An irate Chai Raja snatches the lasso and chucks it away warning Sundar to keep away from it. But the naughty Basha having overheard the exchange snatches up the discarded lasso. He tries a few flicks and thanks to his circus bent of character is able to master it. The thrilled Basha now sets about framing poor Sundar- he wrecks, snatches away fries and disrupts work about the shop with the lasso and Chai Raja believes its Sundar who does it. Sundar must now quickly rein the situation before he gets the proverbial boot.

programme.title: TEA TO TANGO
programme.desc: Basha arrives at the hotel ready to stack up his belly with fritters, but the said organ of his flips like a pancake when he sees the most bewitching of female primates sitting with her owner at Chai Rajas tea shop. Basha is all set to sweep her off her dainty hairy feet but minutes before that Sundar, fumbling one of his deliveries trips on Chai Rajas new jackfruit dessert and ends up doing a complicated tappangutthumove ; which as fate would have it sits absolutely in tune with the music that played on the radio. The female monkey who until now looked comatose jerks to rapturous attention. She cant take her eyes off Sundar. Basha horrified at this unexpected attention-switch tries some classy Tango to woo her. Sundar though slightly irritated by the fawning female monkey, is amused at Bashas frustration there begins an impromptu dance off between Sundar and Basha. Sadly for Basha, all the suave leaps and twists dont seem to impress the damsel of his dreams. Sundar too is in danger of facing flak from Chai Raja for delivering more tappangutthuthan tea! Sundar knowingly trips up letting Basha win the affections of the lady finally...and a pleasant surprise from Basha awaits Sundar as he drags feet to wash the dishes!

programme.title: BIG BUNNY
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to prepare a big feast. Pai sees this as his chance to impress the Elders and earn a new weapon to replace his Mystic Stick. But when he goes to collect the rare striped carrot (a crucial ingredient for his dish), he’s attacked by a Giant Bunny Mutant sent by Negu. His Mystic Stick helps him defeat the Mutant, so he’s content with his weapon…for now.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: Tiggy’s Big Feast
programme.desc: Tiggy is all flustered and confused as he’s not prepared, nor has any idea what to make for a surprise lunch he promised Mayor De Pfeffel. Seems Deedee’s magic is the only answer. The spell she conjures makes Tiggy be totally decided on the recipe that he sees first. And when the spell is cast, the recipe book opens up exactly at the recipe of a pie made of Tika Pila flowers. The problem is that only the Doobydoos can pick the Tika Pila flowers as it grows in the most prickly cacti in Abra-Dabra! But no matter how much Deedee and Nino coax Tiggy to work on another recipe; Tiggy is totally fixated on the Tika Pila flower pie. Though the Doobydoos love eating the flowers, they are too scared of the loud and angry Tika Pila monster that guards them and rush off in a hurry. They finally hit a bargain with Tiggy in exchange for a hundred custard sandwiches. Only with much reassuring and coaxing they pick every Tika Pila flower around. Mayor De Pfeffel is already at Tiggy’s and really hungry. But one Doobydoo is too ambitious and stays back to pick the last Tika Pila flower, but that awakes the Tika Pila monster and he shouts the biggest shout ever, scaring Tiggy and making the pie fly up high and splatter down on his face! The inevitable terrible has happened and there is nothing to give the Mayor. Just then when things couldn’t get any worse Mayor De Pfeffel lunges inside and is happy to see a whole plate of his favourite custard sandwiches.

programme.title: Val the vampire
programme.desc: During Halloween the twins visit a young vampire who cannot manage being scary. They will realize this is only because she never cleans her vampire teeth!

programme.title: Plastic Spoon
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko reuse spoons to make some cute DIYs

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Speed decides its time for an all out assault on the Shadowy Organization. They manage to get the part back, but in the process Speed Sr. is captured. The kids have to save dad and eventually do, but they discover that Speed and Xs mom is Trixie, leader of the Shadowy org.

programme.title: Shy Tommy Prickles
programme.desc: Mewmew is all set for her party but didn’t have sufficient time to handout the invitations. Deedee and Nino agree to help. They soon invite all of Abra-Dabra, but Tommy Prickles isn’t so keen on attending, because he feels so very shy. But as Deedee doesn’t have any spell to make Tommy’s shyness go away she improvises without magic by making Tommy believe that she has cast a spell on Tommy’s hat. Tommy agrees to attend the party in the guise that the hat he is wearing is now a chatter hat that will help him talk to others at the party. Nino is confused as he’s happy on one side that magic wasn’t used but sad that Tommy thinks magic is used. Tommy Prickles fits right in at the party and has fun playing with the Doobydoos and talks so freely and happily with everyone. Just then a huge gust of wind ruffles everything including Tommy’s hat. Poor sad Tommy feels so shy and helpless that he wants to go back home. But Deedee implores him to stay by trying to make him hopeful that Nino would return soon with Tommy’s hat. Tommy slumps on the ground and won’t budge, not until Deedee gets Tommy to don Tiggy’s baker hat. Tommy jumps springs back up and rounds all the party goers to teach them his very own special Wiggly Worm dance. Just then as they all dance in a bee-line behind Tommy, Nino flies in with Tommy’s hat. A confused Tommy discovers that he was wearing Tiggy’s hat till then and is flabbergasted to know that Deedee didn’t work any magic into the hat all along. Tommy Prickles runs away crying. Tommy reasons with Deedee that all of Abra-Dabra will think of him as silly, but Deedee tells him that if he couldn’t believe her, then to at least believe those who love having him along. Tommy looks up to see all his friends walking up to him doing the Wiggly Worm dance. Tommy takes a brave step and listens to his friends wanting have him back. He joins them just the way he is, without his ‘magic’ hat. Deedee finally agrees with Nino that sometimes no magic is good.

programme.title: Afraid of the dark
programme.desc: In a northerly winter world, the twins meet a snowman who is afraid of the dark -- and too scared to travel through the night to enjoy the Northern Lights with his friends.

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: Paper Plate
programme.desc: Simple yet the possibilities are endless, Hepi and Briko surprise us with their ideas

programme.title: Kiwi, flightless birds
programme.desc: When the gods were still ruling the world, when trees and flowers on the ground began to wither due to insects, the goddess WI-Go asks Kiwi to do the hard work of catching insects, and she readily accepts the GoGo.

programme.title: Scary Face
programme.desc: Pancake over-teases Maple with his new “scary face,” then gets a taste of his own medicine in the Zooniverse when, as the old saying goes, his face freezes that way. Just because you think something is fun or funny doesn’t mean everybody else is having the same good time you are.

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: FRUITFUL MULTIPLICATION
programme.desc: Four green Fruit Ninjas find their first real-life enemy in the form of an ancient ninja with a score to settle.

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: The Bigger The Lie
programme.desc: ODESSA thinks she’s gotten away with a little white lie until she visits the Zooniverse where she meets the FIBASAURUS – a tiny, fantastical creature that grows bigger and bigger with every fib that Odessa tells until it is a towering monster capable of upending the Zooniverse!. Little white lies can only grow larger and larger.

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: Old Jeans
programme.desc: Wondering what to do with that old pair? Hepi and Briko have an excellent idea

programme.title: Treasured friends
programme.desc: Ragoo brings a treasure map and the twins find themselves on a desert island were they meet a Pirate with a problem.

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: Coin
programme.desc: What to do with all that spare change? Hepi and Briko have an idea for you

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: You’ve Got Fe-Mail
programme.desc: Fred has written Nora dozens of “love emails” but never sent them—until Sir Percival accidentally hit the “Send” button. To prevent complete embarrassment, Fred hatches a caper to keep Nora away from her computer long enough for Brains to hack into it.

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: Froggy Friends
programme.desc: The frogs from the well are good friends of Keet so when ever Cat tries to enter the house to steal something from the kitchen they will croak and Keet.

programme.title: Surprise Birthday Mix-Up
programme.desc: Twins, Zip and Zap, compete to out-surprise each other with the best birthday party ever, while Villains diguised as a present sneak in to the castle to steal the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Friday finds a stray puppy, but its Fred and Brains who fall in love with it, paying more attention to the pooch than to him. When he starts to suspect the puppy of being more evil than he seems, they don’t believe him. Indeed, the puppy turns out to be a brilliant alien mastermind, intent on global domination.

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: The Magical Flying Horse
programme.desc: The spoilt nephew of the Grand Vizier comes to town and there is a competition to make the boy who has everything something to make him smile for his birthday. When Jamillah asks him what he wants, he asks for a flying horse! Jamillah, Aladdin and Genie do their best to make a flying horse but its beyond Genies powers. In the end Jamillah saves the day by making the boy an origami paper horse with wings that makes him smile.

programme.title: Simpleton – The Queen Bee
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of the “Queen Bee”, by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by a KING, the father of 3 sons who set out in search of adventures. That was some time ago and none of the three has returned, and the KING has received no news. SANDRA and FO will find them, turned to stone, in an enchanted castle. The detective and her assistant will try to solve the mystery and bring the three princes back to life, taking on the guardian of the castle, a sinister, silent DWARF.

programme.title: Rowdy Cloudy
programme.desc: When Pancake angers a cloud by not listening, the livid cumulus vents its anger by taking Pancake on a wild ride, storming all over the Zooniverse. An apology, when sincere, can help make things right.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: A Prodigious Nose_Based On Pinocchio
programme.desc: On this occasion, the fairytale detective SANDRA travels to the popular tale of Pinocchio, to help poor, distraught GEPPETTO. His son has once again turned into a lifeless puppet that not even the Blue Fairy can bring back to life. SANDRA and her assistant, FO, after discovering that the puppet in GEPPETTO’s house is simply an imitation, face a difficult investigation and end up discovering that the culprit is, once again, the evil STROMBOLI. This puppet master is using the innocent PINOCCHIO to commit one robbery after another, thanks to his astonishing growing nose.

programme.title: A Cold Crunch
programme.desc: It is freezing cold. Don is wrapped in a blanket when he notices a glow from the mouse’s hole. Wearing sunglasses and shorts, They have an orange coil burning right in the centre and its toasty and warm in there. Don has found a solution, he picks up the phone and orders for an electric blanket!

programme.title: The New Otter In Town
programme.desc: After thinking that his mother doesnt know what its like to be a kid, in the Zooniverse, Pancake becomes friends with a fun otter kid - who turns out to be his mom!. Judging people/People are often more than what they seem

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: The Supreme Law – Simbad
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, the elf Fo, travel into the story of Sinbad the Sailor, having been called out by PRINCESS ARIBA, the daughter of the GRAND CALIPH. There, they learn that the intrepid sailor has been arrested by the VIZIER, accused of having broken a supreme law: lying to the Grand Caliph, when recounted the stories of his incredible voyages to him. Unless someone does something, SINBAD will be executed in 12 hours’ time. SANDRA and FO must find irrefutable proof that the wonders described by SINBAD are true, while at the same time escaping from the claws of the evil VIZIER.

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: Bottle Racquet
programme.desc: Fred and friends don’t have a place to play “Laser Ball.” An eccentric environmentalist inspires Fred to build his own island out of discarded plastic water bottles. When Friday is sent to collect a quarter million of them, he turns into a plastic water bottle menace!

programme.title: PAI THE WIZARD
programme.desc: Discouraged with cleaning Maestro Meow’s humble hut, Pai uses the Elder’s conch horn (which Pai thinks is magic) to summon what he thinks are “Cleaner Birds.” But they prove to be Party Birds, and soon have overrun the Westerly Breeze!

programme.title: The Lightning Strikes
programme.desc: Its raining heavily and the three are nicely tucked in the sofa and watching a tv show as the tv goes out.

programme.title: Knot My Problem
programme.desc: Maple keeps forgetting how to tie her shoes until Promi shows her a way to remember. Practice makes perfect, and perseverance leads to achievement.

programme.title: La chica que él nunca notó
programme.desc: Un compromiso falso entre Jade y Eros se convierte en un romance lleno de complicaciones

programme.title: La chica que él nunca notó
programme.desc: Un compromiso falso entre Jade y Eros se convierte en un romance lleno de complicaciones

programme.title: Prisionera citadina
programme.desc: Lena y Sergey esperan gemelos y pronto recibirán su nuevo apartamento, pero les espera un reto más.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: I Don't Scare 1956
programme.desc: Popeye has beaten Bluto to a date with Olive. Seeing that Olive is superstitious, Bluto changes the date to Friday the 13th, and proceeds to rig various proofs that bad things will happen if she goes out.

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: Popeye's 20th Anniversary 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films, in a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', Bing Crosby, 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, he instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto.

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Much ado About Nutting 1953
programme.desc: A squirrel in a downtown park lugs a giant coconut back home, but nothing he does can seem to crack it open.

programme.title: The Song of the Birds-1935
programme.desc: The Song of the Birds-1935

programme.title: Gold Rush Daze 1939
programme.desc: A man stops for gas on his way to dig for gold. The man at the station tells him what it was like back in 1849 in San Francisco, which we see. A sucker is hauled off the street and sat down at a card game; he dashes off as soon as someone shouts "they found gold in the hills" but others stake claims before he can. He ends up chopping off a cliff, falling down, and landing in the hospital. The doctor gives him news of another gold strike and he rushes out to begin panning. After some more mining gags and a song, we see a montage of more failed gold strikes. Back to the present day, where the storyteller claims to have sworn off gold, until a rider passes through with news of another strike, when he trades the station for the car and sets out after the gold.

programme.title: Unrolled

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar expert Chris Kelly to review the Davidoff Escurio cigar. programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar aficionados Jared and Alex to review the Foundation Aksum cigar. Together, they discuss its rich flavors, smooth draw, and craftsmanship, offering their insights into what makes this cigar stand out in the crowd.

programme.title: Behind the Blend

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar enthusiast Jared to review the Henry Clay Warhawk cigar. programme.title: Unrolled

programme.title: Ale Vigil Winemaker + Bodega Bonfati + Pasarela federal + Anabel Sanchez
programme.desc: Chicas Guapas is the first TV and online community of fashion, beauty and lifestyle with #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas. They are Latin American influencers in Argentina, Uruguay, Chile, Mexico, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Paraguay, Costa Rica, Venezuela and the UK. In Chicas Guapas, the audience can become a protagonist by voting weekly their favorite makeup and hair tutorials, contesting for tickets to exclusive events, meeting emerging designers & celebrities and exploring the trends of each season from the hand of our #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas . Chicas Guapas has more than 97 million monthly impressions. It was created and is directed by Lucía Ugarte, from Buenos Aires, Argentina.

programme.title: Argentinos en Miami + Warmichella + Back So Pink

programme.title: NAOMI SCOTT: estreno de SMILE 2 + Desfile MARIAN SAUD + Yo Jefa | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 09/11/24:
- Entrevista exclusiva de Lucía Ugarte a #NaomiScott por el estreno de #Smile2. - Cobertura del desfile de Marian Saud: Rox habló con la diseñadora y con invitadas de lujo como Candela Ruggeri, #milettfigueroa, Sofía Macaggi, Stephanie Demner y Agustina Casanova. - Tráiler de "Cómo si fuéramos sólo amigos", la nueva comedia romántica de Sebastián Badilla y Manu Viale, con Lucía Ugarte como productora ejecutiva. - Lanzamiento de #Skin1004 en Argentina: hablamos con #pampita, Paula Chávez y @SimonScaranoDermatologo. - #YoJefa: la historia de Niki Baratt, la creadora de "Niki beauty bar".

programme.title: Confessions Of A Time Traveler The Man From 3036
Guest Roy Wood Jr. - City Limits
programme.desc: Comedian Roy Wood Jr. talks fatherhood, performing at the White House Correspondents' Dinner, and his new show, Tribulations. He also speaks on the current state of Hip-Hop and why we need each other.

programme.title: Guests Tasia Simpson, Wendy Lee Turner, and Charlie Mac
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Tasia Simpson, Wendy Lee Turner, and Charlie Mac who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Dating Mistakes, Sick Kids
programme.desc:
Dating in 2025 can be WILD! This week on the Nessa Off Air Podcast, Nessa and Katrina B are sharing dating stories. Now, even though these two aren’t out in the dating world anymore, their hair and makeup artists Marci and Lino are! And they…have…stories… and Nessa and Katrina B are here to tell them all! This opens up a much bigger conversation about DATING ETIQUETTE in 2025. This is a really fun and interesting conversation and we’re sure there are a lot of opinions out there about this and we want to know what you think!
Next, these two have an important PSA to ALL PARENTS out there: KEEP YOUR SICK KIDS AT HOME!!! Tune into this week’s episode to find out how we got onto this topic and how it matters!

programme.title: Guests Trina and Towanda Braxton
programme.desc: Trina and Towanda Braxton talk their new show "The Braxtons".

programme.title: Guest Sherri Shepard
programme.desc: Sherri Shepherd is a comedian, a host of the daily talk show Sherri, an actress, and an all around lovely person. Whenever I see her I start to smile. This interview is awesome — we talk about the craft of comedy, her fear before going onstage, hosting a talk show, the challenge of being a man, what you need to do to successfully date her, and much more. She’s amazing.

programme.desc: An inspirational documentary about the importance of expanding your circle of compassion in life.

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: Clown Motel
programme.desc: Clown Motel follows a group of ghost hunters, coming from an old ghost town and a bachelorette party, returning home from Las Vegas. When the groups meet up, by mistake, they're left to discover if the motel is really abandoned and haunted by the souls, of the clowns, that once lived there...

programme.title: Demon Baby
programme.desc: A young couple looking to rekindle a damaged relationship retreat to the remote Scottish Highlands. They are haunted by their past, their surroundings and each other.

programme.title: The Last Nosferatu
programme.desc: Ethan has been single for several months and decides to meet people via the Internet. One night, he dates “Black Pearl” whom he literally falls in love with, but she disappears, so he decides to go looking for her. One evening, Black Pearl resurfaces and seems to be hiding a mysterious secret that will lead him to a tragic fate...

programme.title: La Feria del Diablo
programme.desc: Protagonizada por Justin Duncan, Gerald Crum, Mercedes Peterson y John Charles Dickson. Las estrellas de dos series de televisión paranormales, rivales y enfrentadas, convergen en un parque de atracciones embrujado y abandonado que termina siendo el epicentro del infierno. Ahora están todos atrapados en una guerra sin cuartel contra el mal puro...

programme.title: Naufragio
programme.desc: Mientras transportaba un paquete importante, una joven sufre un accidente de coche en medio de la nada, dejándola atrapada debajo del coche. Poco a poco, se da cuenta de que no solo unos hombres muy malvados la persiguen para recuperar el objeto que transporta, sino que algo muy peligroso la acecha desde las profundidades del bosque...

programme.title: El Juego del Duende
programme.desc: Después de que un hombre adinerado envía a un grupo de ladrones a buscar leyendas urbanas con la intención de abrir un museo lleno de criaturas míticas, pronto descubrirán la leyenda de un duende...

programme.title: Somos Pobres
programme.desc: Una familia muy pobre espera la Navidad con gran entusiasmo para celebrar y ver lo que les trae Santa Claus. Los niños van al cerro a cortar un árbol y decorarlo para poner los regalos que les traerá su padre después de vender la cosecha. Sin embargo, cuando el padre llega, está borracho y sin dinero, destrozando el árbol y golpeando a sus hijos. Uno de ellos decide huir de casa y, más tarde, entra en el negocio de las drogas.

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo
programme.desc: El cartel más poderoso ha puesto sus reglas y deben respetarse, la regla principal del patrón es prohibir los secuestros en la plaza. El comandante Ántrax es el encargado de hacer cumplir las órdenes del señor.

programme.title: El Basukazo 2
programme.desc: Después de haber sido dado por muerto, Edgar es rescatado por una bella mujer que trabaja en la mafia, cuando Edgar se recupera de sus heridas se integra al nuevo equipo ya que se necesita un hombre que sea experto en el manejo de las armas.

programme.title: Añoranzas de mi Madre
programme.desc: Ana, una mujer ambiciosa, arrogante y sin escrúpulos ha perdido el verdadero significado de la vida, de los sentimientos y de la Naturaleza misma. Al momento de fallecer su madre hace un viaje fantasioso a través de una regresión inesperada, donde su propia madre infante la guía, para conocer sus ancestros, sanar su pasado y por consecuencia su presente.

programme.title: Asalto al Cine
programme.desc: La policía toma por asalto un espacio donde grupos de jóvenes se reúnen, El Negus, el Chale, el Sapo y la Chata, logran escapar, viendo cerrarse las puertas del Faro detrás suyo. Cuatro jóvenes amigos, en una unidad habitacional de la colonia guerrero, se aburren esperando evadir sus conflictos personales. Un día como cualquier otro, deciden asaltar un cine, con la esperanza de encontrar en esto una salida a su monotonía; pero en cambio sólo encuentran acelerar su choque con la realidad y terminan por volver al mismo sitio: una banca de la unidad.

programme.title: Aerosol
programme.desc: El líder de una banda mexicana mata a un oponente en la guerra de pandillas en los 80's, por lo que huye a la ciudad de Los Ángeles, California. Dieciocho años después regresa al barrio sin un objetivo definido, sólo para encontrar a su hermano menor, involucrado en las pandillas de hoy. El crimen organizado utiliza niños para distribuir droga en los barrios. En combatir la corrupción y el crimen que hay en el barrio, Nuk encuentra un significado para su retorno y un camino para redimir las muertes que causó

programme.title: 1313 FrankenReyna
programme.desc: Un grupo de cinco jóvenes acuerdan actuar como "sujetos de prueba" para la cirujana plástica Victoria Franks. Pero sus vacaciones a la lujosa mansión de Victoria en Malibú se vuelven mortal, cuando su anfitriona científica loca implementa una agenda nefasta y homicida.

programme.title: Call TV
programme.desc: Lucía, una actriz en decadencia, acepta presentar un programa nocturno de preguntas tontas. Sin darse cuenta de que se ha metido en un gran lío que le hará pasar la peor noche de su vida

programme.title: El Juego del Sexo
programme.desc: Un alienígena cambiante procedente del espacio exterior causa estragos en un pequeño pueblo rural del suroeste de Estados Unidos, cerca del legendario Área 51 de fama ovni. Estos extraterrestres son una raza devoradora de cerebros a quienes les encanta decapitar y comerse a los humanos. Están entre nosotros y lo han estado durante millones de años.

programme.title: Multiply
programme.desc: Are you believing in God for a harvest? In “Multiply,” Pastor Jabin Chavez reminded us that when we sow what God has already given us, we allow God the opportunity to multiply it.

programme.title: The Blessing Of Letting Go
programme.desc: In “The Blessing Of Letting Go,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that when we worship God in the middle of our situation, it relieves the pressure we feel when we try to handle it on our own.

programme.title: God Has Given Me Everything I Need For The Season I'm In
programme.desc: Take inventory of what you already have. Join Pastor Holly Furtick as she unpacks how to trust God with your now as He prepares you for what’s next.

programme.title: "Not Now" Is Not "No"
programme.desc: Sometimes, when you’ve been waiting a long time on something, God isn’t saying, “no,” He’s going slow to teach you something. This sermon will help you feel encouraged that just because it’s not happening on your schedule, doesn’t mean it’s not happening on God’s.
